333883791233716664.Text: I spoke with Jeleen at the Imperial Cult shrine in Fort Frostmoth, and he is deeply troubled.  A missionary named Mirisa set out from the shrine over a month ago, and hasn't returned.  If I can find Mirisa and return her safely to Jeleen, he will grant a generous reward.  Jeleen suggests I look in the Lake Fjalding region, to the north of Fort Frostmoth.

125518281255016832.Text: It seems Mirisa the missionary was preaching more about the evils of alcohol consumption than the benefits of the Imperial Cult.  She was last seen heading for a mead hall called Thirsk, in the hopes of swaying the resident Nords from their love of drink.

402336051609116903.Text: The missionary Mirisa is being held captive by a Nord barbarian named Erich the Unworthy, in his room in the Thirsk mead hall.

717645291078726637.Text: I have killed the Nord barbarian Erich the Unworthy. Thankfully it was an even fight, since none of Eric's fellow clan members came to his assistance.

1616159792706015248.Text: I have located Mirisa the missionary, locked in the quarters of Erich the Unworthy at the Thirsk mead hall. She's been imprisoned for over three weeks.

15318142402528229235.Text: I have agreed to escort Mirisa back to the Imperial Cult Shrine at Fort Frostmoth.

13211448822979885.Text: I have escorted the missionary Mirisa safely to the Imperial Cult shrine in Fort Frostmoth.

1545254351635713177.Text: Jeleen was overjoyed at my rescue of Mirisa, and rewarded me with 300 gold pieces.

2193022658217121382.Text: Mirisa the missionary is dead.  I should report this sad news to Jeleen at the Imperial Cult Shrine at Fort Frostmoth.

6706276132298010407.Text: Jeleen was ovecome with grief at the news of Mirisa's death.  He thanked me for relaying the information, and paid me for my services.
